current.message:
fix: Update all URLs to use doc.imoogleai.xyz subdomain and remove Stripe configuration

- Updated .env with correct API URLs for imoogleai.xyz domain
- Changed site URL in astro.config.mjs to doc.imoogleai.xyz
- Updated sitemap.mjs with new domain URLs
- Updated manifest.json with new start_url
- Updated config.ts with social media URLs for imoogleai
- Removed all Stripe-related environment variables
- This completes the domain migration from HNM Devs to imoogleai.xyz

previous.message:
fix: Add graceful error handling for API calls and environment configuration

- Add .env file with HNM Devs API URLs
- Implement try-catch for API calls in projects page
- Prevents 500 errors when backend API is unavailable
- Projects pages will now gracefully degrade with empty user counts
- Resolves runtime serverless function crashes on Vercel
